articles.title: Motorola’s first Edge 60 phone feels like canvas - The Verge
articles.description: The Motorola Edge 60 Fusion is out now in Europe, Asia, and Latin America with a canvas-effect finish and updated AI features.
articles.content:
The Edge 60 Fusion is available now in Europe, Asia, and Latin America.
The Edge 60 Fusion is available now in Europe, Asia, and Latin America.

articles.title: Co-MVP Peterson leads West to All American win - ESPN
articles.description: Darryn Peterson scored 18 points as the game's co-MVP along with Cameron Boozer, leading the West over the East 105-92 on Tuesday night in the McDonald's All American boys' game at Barclays Center.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Darryn Peterson scored 18 points as the game's co-MVP, leading the West over the East 105-92 on Tuesday night in the McDonald's All American boys' game at Barclays Center.
